revised_title: A New Method for Measuring the Quantity of Acid Salts in Acid Spirits
tldr: The author describes a new aerometer, a device for measuring the volume of liquids, and its use in determining the exact quantity of acid salts contained in acid spirits. The aerometer allows for precise measurements of liquid volume and helps account for variations in weather conditions that can affect the weight of liquids. The author also provides a table of acid salt quantities in various acid spirits, demonstrating the effectiveness of the aerometer and offering insight into the chemical composition of these substances.
